comment: Took Professor Gilbert for statistics and it was great! However, it is an online class so it's a lot more on the student to learn the material. Don't hesitate to reach out to him if you need help. He's very kind and sweet. We had ALEKS work every week and the tests are all on ALEKS. He does post weekly notes going over the material though.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Lepadatu was amazing. The grades in his class are based on points, therefore, you don't have to worry about the percentages so much as the points. He rounds up grades and offers extra credit through his exams. Absolutely do your homework, not only will it help, but it adds an additional amount of points, too. I love him!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: I took this class online this semester, and although there is a lot of homework, the class was pretty easy. I'm not even good at math, but Professor Lepadtu is so helpful, and really useful when you need help. He also leaves sweet little notes of inspiration at the end of his weekly update, and those would always brighten my day. Highly Recommend.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: This class is very tedious so you really have to keep up. You get a lot of homework and there are three tests. The content isnt extremely hard but just a lot of work. This professor is really great and cares about his students.
He is a great teacher and really cares for his students. I would take him again!

I took this class online and it went well. The professor is nice and will help you out if you need it but you do most of your learning on connect math. There are weekly discussion posts but they aren't hard, and the homework and tests are on connect math. The tests are very similar to the homework and some of the questions are worth extra credit

He is such a sweet guy! Took him for Stats 1107 online and ended up with a B. I am horrible at math but ended up with a B. There was a lot of HW every week but his HW questions are basically test question with different numbers. You can use the online textbook for the test so it helps. Overall he was a great professor who will work with you! Take!

He is an amazing professor. I was worried about taking stats online but he makes everything easy to understand. You only need to complete 70% of the homework to get full credit but I would definitely try to do it all since the concepts from the homework will be on the tests. He is also very inspirational in his posts. Take him.

Took Professor Lepadatu for STAT 1107 online and I am glad I did! He does give a ton of homework, but you only have to complete 70% of it to get a full grade and you can miss 3 homework assignments without a penalty. But, trust me, you'll want to do the homework as all test material come from it. Class was organized as easy to follow each week.

If you have the opportunity to learn from Dr. Lepadatu, you should. I took him for Math 1107. His kindness is unparalleled, and he genuinely cares about this students. He is great at understanding that people are people and have other things going on in life. It is refreshing to see that people like him still exist in the world of academia!

I was really worried about taking Stats online, but it was a great decision & I made an "A". You can use your notes especially the practice exercises that have similar problems as the tests. The professor is helpful & easy to reach. Go back & do the practice exercises before the test & you'll do fine. It's a lot of work, but worth it.

Stat is really annoying but this prof really tries to make sure students get the best grades and understand all the material. Discussion posts every week. 2 questions at most. The hw modules are extremely redundant and long, but you only need 70s in those to pass. Only do the hw for practice, don't waste too much of your time.
Great professor for an online math course. He really cares about his students and their success.

This class is very well organized and fair in its grading. Dr. Lepadatu provides the overview for each week, which basically tells you to read the chapter and powerpoint, do the homework, and do a discussion post. As long as you do that you will easily make a B or higher. The tests are easier than the homework too. He seems like a nice guy too.

I have never been great at math, but I did really well in this course. There is a lot of hw on connectmath, but it prepares you for the test and allows you to teach yourself. There are required discussion posts with extra credit opportunities. Dr. L is a nice guy and accessible for any questions. He also cares about his students and is accessible
rating_tags: Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Took as an online class. He uses ConnectMath link for tests and homework, which is great because ConnectMath provides examples and resources. Prof Lepadatu is charismatic and fun. Helpful with giving you enough time to finish the homework and helpful with tests.
Took statistics as an online course. Although I didn't get the best grade, professor definitely cares and always responds quickly with a caring approach. Great class!

This professor is the BEST!! Take him if you can! I took his online class, and we had weekly homework and discussion posts. He responds to emails always and is so helpful. There are 3 tests and a cumulative final. The homework you get to try until you get it right! I would take this class again for sure!! TAKE HIS CLASS!!

He's a really great prof! I took him online, but he tells you a lot about himself and is really funny and inspirational. Online homework is kind of heavy, but he reminds us that his class is so tiny in the scheme of our careers and never lets us get too stressed. Take him!

Although learning math online is difficult in itself, Professor Lepadatu is an amazing teacher who helped make it easier. He gives you several sources to show you how to solve the problems (both through his powerpoint notes and videos on ConnectMath). There is a lot of homework, but that's to be expected for an online class.

Professor Lepadatu is an amazing statistics instructor. He truly cares about the well-being of his students. He answers your questions in a timely manner and always has words of encouragement to share. He will do his best to help you succeed. I highly recommend taking his course!!

Incredibly impressed with this professor (enough to give my first rate my professor review). His expectations were clear, goes above and beyond to help when needed and keeps the class motivated throughout the semester. I'm definitely not a math person but this was by far the best experience with any math or online class I've taken to date.
Great overall experience. You have to do the HW but overall its makes the test more simple.  If you can do the HW your will gets As on the tests.

Professor Lepadtu is a really nice guy who you can tell sincerely cares about his students. His class is routine and straightforward. Do HW in Connectmath with lenient due dates, participate in weekly discussion, and 4 tests (one is the final). MUST HAVE A TI-84!!! I'm not a math person and I got an A.

He is the most helpful and understanding teacher I have had in college. He is willing to work with students no matter the issue. All you need to do to make an A in his class is COMMIT and do the work.   Take him and you will not regret it. He addresses any questions or issues promptly and is very kind. I 100% recommend him.
Good Teacher for those like myself not good at math (Online Course)

Professor Lepadatu was without a doubt one of the best professors I have had. Math is not at all my cup of tea and he made it exceptionally easy to understand the material, was very understanding and willing to help, straightforward, and just exceptional all around. Would absolutely take again.

I took statistics online, and by far the best online class I have taken. He is fair with deadlines and gives chances to redo homework. I have failed stats once before and have a solid B now. As long as you do the homework and understand the material for tests you will pass.

Professor Lepadatu is definitely the best math professor I've ever taken. I've always been pretty weak at math, but he brings this really relaxed, positive atmosphere to it (even though it's an online class) and it actually made a huge difference in how I viewed the course. A great online class for people who are nervous about math.

If you have a strong math background, you'll likely make an A in this course. Be careful and pay attention to all the details while taking the exams. Aside from that, he has a great sense of humor, very quick to respond to emails unless he states otherwise that he will not be around.  ConnectMath is very helpful to understand the material as well
I hate him. Do not ever take this man. I regret it every single day.
The class was  online and the coursework was assigned by chapters. He gives you ample time to do the homework and is lenient with participation grades and grades for homework.

This was my first statistics course.. ever and I actually really enjoyed the semester. The professor's clear grading system and weekly emails detailing assignments due was beyond helpful in staying on top of tasks. Book is not required (online copy avail.), weekly homework, four test including cumulative final. stay focused and you'll be fine!

Professor Lepadatu is seriously the best online professor I have ever had.  I am seriously soo bad at math and absolutely hate it and I have actually done really well in his class thanks to all of the resources that are available. Everything is done on connect math with 3 tests and a final. Also, an online post every week. Best stats class ever!

Everything is done through ConnectMath; homework, tests, ebook, etc. You have to write seven discussion posts (one each week) but as long as you do them, you get an A for them. He can come across kind of rude through email, but other than that, you really done interact with him. Just make sure you keep up with ConnectMath and you'll get an A.

I took this class online. All of the homework and tests are through connect math. Was not clear on attempts for the test. Allowed 2 in connect math but really only allowed 1. Grades homework and participation at the end of semester.  Is rude through email.

Easiest Teacher I have Ever Had! I should have failed this class but I passed with a c. I got a 70 on first test then 55's on the last 3 tests. The homework was worth a test grade as well and I did 50% of it. he gave me a 100% on homework when I didn't do all of it which brought me up to a 69% then on the final posted grade it curved me to a C.

great professor. all work was done through connect math, had on average 3 hw assignments every two weeks. Power points were not very helpful. not much done on D2L. two tests. one quiz. dropped 4 hw grades, extra credit, and dropped quiz. Rounded final grade up. overall easy class. I would recommend him.

Professor Lepadatu was an awesome instructor. He was absolutely hilarious and very interesting to listen to. Even though my class was the first time he had taught Stat, he was very easy to learn from and seemed to know what he was talking about. I made an A! Take him! You'll love him!

I thought this professor was very helpful and funny. Although he was sometimes unclear about some concepts, I found him to be as useful and helpful as possible. He did everything he could to help get his students a passing grade.

He knows what he is talking about. If you read and prepare like you are suppose to for the class then you will be just fine. Most complained, but they were not in the classroom half the time. Statistics is not a class anyone can wing. I would definitely recommend this professor.

This professor certainly put his best effort forward in helping his students learn the material. He always reviewed concepts multiple times, gave study guides and practice problems, & always took questions from students during class. The people complaining abt him probably missed class, didn't do the study guides, and complained instead of trying.

Taking this class was probably one of the biggest mistakes in my college career. He does not understand how to teach whatsoever. When we tried to tell him what we needed to do to succeed in the class, he got mad and pissy. DO NOT TAKE HIM! SAVE YOUR GPA! Basically the entire class regrets taking this man for stats.

Very confusing with the material and gets somewhat defensive when  you give him feedback on his teaching and how to improve it. very nice man and very funny, but just shouldn't teach stat anymore. I wouldn't recommend. It will kill your GPA.

DO NOT TAKE HIM FOR MATH 1107!!He doesn't know what he's doing. Students are constantly correcting him. I failed my first test in college (maybe ever) in his class. He only has 3 exams and a final. No homework. No chance of bringing up your grade after a bad test. HORRIBLE!! DON"T DO IT!
Online class is time consuming but the tests are not that hard.

Lepadatu comes across as a pretty unenthusiastic professor at first, but he becomes more animated once he actually starts diving into philosophy. He'll get frustrated if students act disinterested in the lectures, but I guess that's understandable. Easy A, too. Certainly one of the easier classes I've taken.

really great teacher, is not opinionated and refers directly to philosophers when he teaches. Uses great examples. quizzes and tests are based directly from his lectures. Learned so many things from this class that may seem simple in life but really is not. no book needed, notes maybe, Easy Easy A

Tries to open your mind and the goal is to challenge your beliefs, something everyone needs to experience. Didn't get to everything on the syllabus, but interesting all the same. Take the oral exam, not the written test!

Easy A if you go to class and take notes. Two tests on line almost all from the notes; I never even touched the book. His lectures are crazy; he is a little extravagant... DO NOT WRITE THE FINAL PAPER TAKE THE ORAL EXAM. He asks you 3 questions on the oral test if you answer 2 there is the A; the questions are easy and from his lectures, TAKE NOTES

if you are a devout christian that thinks examining your beliefs is blasphemous, stay away. But if you want to learn some philosophy with little effort and get an A, go for it. But don't take at night because you will fall asleep.....lectures are endless and he repeats himself ten times
He is very opinionated and talks bad about God and Christianity If your a Christian I woudn't recommend taking this class because you will be offended.

This was a very easy A but BORING lecture.  He gets on his soapbox and repeats himself over and over... I didn't learn a thing in this class, and dont even dare to speak up in class because he'll make you sound like you dont know what youre talking about. But take him if you want an easy A but be prepared to want to fall asleep!

AWESOME!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND TAKING HIM. He is very knowledgable. He makes you think...remember it's philosophy. His tests are online and are not too hard. He is on the laid back side on attendance. As another post stated, he says what is on his mind...including some words that may be offensive. But this is what makes this prof. great...he's real.
He is one of the best instructors.

Amazing professor. Full and very interesting discussions. He is very easy in his grading and is more interested in helping you learn about Philosophy than in drilling you with unnecessary homework/exams. If you need this class, sign up for him. Incredibly easy to make an A.

SIGN UP NOW!! He?s not big on attendance, however if you miss class you?re missing some of the best lecture ever. He?s laid back, but very entertaining. Watch out for the ?F? bomb; he will drop a few during his lectures. If you are touchy about religious topics, then this is not the class for you. He'll tell you that the first day of class. Easy A!

Best Prof. I have ever had!This is what education is about; listen, learn,& think. No useless busy work, or $300 books. He doesn't read through the powerpoints like everyother teacher, he explains everything in his own words. The hard part is accepting what you hear, it is shocking, but this is life. Online quizzes are from class lectures. Yay!

He definitely introduces different ideas and he does not respect conventional beliefs so if you are very touchy about certain subjects (like religion) don't take him. He also does a good job at relating current event with his subject.
Good understanding of philosophy?If you want to learn something about the philosophy, then he is right professor to pick.

He allows ALOT of absenses; however, GO TO CLASS and you will get an A. He knows what he is talking about and is extremely knowledgable about the subject. All he asks is that you have an open mind. Not an expensive class either. Just a $20 book!! This professor is recommended for this course!!!!
One of the easyiest classes I have ever taken

Let me first say that I am a Christian so I was worried about taking a philosophy class, but I was glad I did. This professor is awesome and he never made me feel uncomfortable with my beliefs. It is a phil class so of course you will talk about it, but I enjoyed the class and the prof. easy A if you do the work! Online tests and extra credit.

Very nice man. Class was interesting. He gave 10 online quizzes and a paper. He talked alot and repeated alot, but it helped when it came to the test.  Gave extra credit work, if needed. Accent was not hard to understand.

This class sucked!! I made an EASY A, and hardly went. But he DOES take attendance. When I did go I struggled to stay awake as he stood on his soap box and belittled anyone who dared to speak up. The whole semester all we heard was his views on various hot topics. Did not cover anything remotely related to philosophy..DONT TAKE HIM!

Great Teacher! If you don't make an A in the class, then you are brain dead. Only four tests and they are compltely online..not to mention that he gives you the questions the a few days before the test. Very opinionated and very sacastic. Some comments may be taken the wrong way...but it is because he is a passionate speaker. Easy A

A fantastic teacher and class. The class is quite easy, with 3 online tests. Mr. Lepadatu's lecture style and humor are very entertaining: he's obviously passionate about teaching. He can be opinionated, but he emphasizes the fallibility of his views, and it's clear he wants to have an honest dialog with his students to make them think.

By far one of the best professor's at KSU. He was so interesting and actually opens your mind to new ideas. 4 exams. Take him! My roommates had PHIL with another professor and wished they were in my class!

I agree. I would not take philosophy at KSU if I had to take anyone but Lepadatu. Great teacher. He challenges you to think, but he makes it so much fun. Some people think it's a piece of cake, but that's not the point. I learned so much in his class and I wish I could take it a thousand times over. I encourage anyone to take his class. Enjoy!

If you don't get an A you deserve an F in this class. Professor Lepadatu is one of the best at KSU. Four take home exams and extra credit which helps. He does challenge you to think. Please don't take offense! The class is very interesting. He loves movies so you will get to watch movies too! Please take him the A is practically handed to you.
Professor Lepadatu is passionate about the subject matter and it is reflected in his lectures.  He offers a safe environment to share your honest opinions.

If you don't make an A with Dr. Lepadatu, you're either not coming to class or are too lazy to do some light reading and take 4 multiple-choice take home exams. In addition to the ease and clarity of the class, it was actually enjoyable. He challenges you to think, so be prepared to do that and pay attention to his lectures. He's excellent.

Don't listen to anyone who says that he's anti-Christian. At first it may seem that way, but he's just trying to get you to think.Best class I've had so far in college and you actually learn something. Four online tests, make sure you don't mess up and even if you do the extra credit will save you. (note: I'm a strong Catholic, not an atheist)

Honestly, best professor I've ever had. Easy class - only four tests - but the ONLY CLASS where I learned something this semester. Definitely worthwhile. Don't take philosophy unless you can get him. AMAZING CLASS!!!

His class is very easy to understand and he teaches material very well.  It is difficult to get your view across though.  Online discussions can get rather difficult with him involved, but he is a smart man and I respect his side.  Don't let the religion bashing fool you.  He is there to make you think and be more secure with yourself.
Best professor i've ever had, not kidding. Looked forward to every class of his. Great guy, easy class, get him now.

If you can write a short paper about a topic or philosopher that is decently written, you can get an easy A in this class.  He lectures & if you take notes, you can easily write the papers.  The grade consists of 3 papers & that's it.  Go to the writing center if you aren't a good writer & you'll be fine.
